mapper.insert: INSERT INTO red_packet_record (amount, nick_name, img_url, uid, red_packet_id , create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{redPacketId,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
